SizeVisitor Class Reference

This visitor calculates the size of a RHS, which is simply a count of the number of terminals and non-terminals that occur there. More...

Private Attributes

int theSize
 The number of terminals & non-terms encountered during this visit.

Detailed Description

This visitor calculates the size of a RHS, which is simply a count of the number of terminals and non-terminals that occur there.
